# identifier

**Instance Property**

A string used to uniquely identify a discount offer for a product.

## Declaration

```swift
var identifier: String { get }
```

## Discussion

You set up offers and their identifiers in App Store Connect. If the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKPaymentDiscount/identifier] is not valid, an [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKError/Code/invalidOfferIdentifier] error can result.

## Identifying the Discount

- **keyIdentifier**: A string that identifies the key used to generate the signature.
